sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>mouth</radical> of the <radical>World</radical> <radical>Tree</radical>, all it does is <kanji>chat</kanji> and <kanji>talk</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You'd think the World Tree's mouth would talk wisdom, but all it does is chat, chat, chat.
readingMnemonic: To <kanji>chat</kanji> or <kanji>talk</kanji> with the World Tree, just head over to <reading>Sha</reading>man <reading>Bay</reading> (<ja>しゃべ</ja>).
readingInfo: The locals shorten Shaman Bay to "Sha Bay," because they always go there to <ja>喋る</ja> with the World Tree. Imagine all the shamans hanging about in the bay.
